title: Medical Practical Competency Enhancement: Gamification and Social Media-Based Science Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level basic knowledge in science and digital device usage experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain scientific problem-solving processes with over 80% accuracy using gamification elements.
By conducting peer evaluations and feedback three or more times on a social media-based interactive platform, learners enhance collaborative learning skills.
Learners master core scientific concepts with over 90% proficiency through a digital badge acquisition system.
Learners improve scientific decision-making skills by analyzing data collected in a gamified environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
